mapper.insert: insert into dibs(dibsno, pno, userid, quantity, optionvalue, price) values(dibssq.nextval, ${pno}, #{userid}, ${quantity}, #{optionvalue}, ${price})
mapper.select: select dibsno, pno, userid, optionvalue, dibsdate, quantity, price from dibs where userid=#{param1} order by dibsdate desc

select * from (select * from (select DISTINCT d.pno, d.userid, to_char(d.dibsdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as dibsdate, p.pname, p.img1, p.stock, p.pprice, p.saleprice from (select * from dibs where userid=#{userid} order by dibsdate) d join product p on d.pno=p.pno order by dibsdate desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageRecord} order by dibsdate asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by dibsdate desc
select count(dibsno) as totalRecord from dibs where userid = #{userid}
